column2: great tapas restaurant. The menu is set up so each plate is put into a category. For example
column6: etc. I loved this layout because I could easily get each genre of meat. Scallops
column8: salmon are all great choices. The service was great. My guest and I were able to get a table within 15 minutes on a Saturday night on the patio
column10: we waited at the bar. Great thing about this place is they announce your table over a loud speaker - no way you can miss your table.
